text: Building modules via hubl or React is really a personal preference. Both will work just fine. If you are familiar with react you will get all of the benefits that come with building modules in react. HubL will also get you as far as you need to go!

Hello everyone,
when I tried to fetch a theme in local development which has few files, images and template it works.
But when I tried to fetch a project theme which has lots of modules and templates and images doesn't work
Working and not working screenshot. I have che-test and menicon-corporate theme in Design manager. I started clone che-test to menicon-corporate and building templates and modules.
Hi <@UQWGKUEN7> Ok, thank you so much for your reply. So basically, there are no advantages to using React instead of HubL.
